title: Mickey Mouse
shortDescription: The iconic Disney mascot and beloved cartoon character
biography: Mickey Mouse is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney and Ub Iwerks. He first appeared in the short film Steamboat Willie in 1928 and has since become one of the most recognizable characters in the world.

title: Minnie Mouse
biography: Minnie Mouse is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney. She is Mickey Mouse's girlfriend and has been a prominent figure in Disney media since her debut in Steamboat Willie.

title: Donald Duck
shortDescription: Hot-tempered duck and Mickey's best friend
biography: Donald Fauntleroy Duck is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney. Known for his semi-intelligible speech and his mischievous and temperamental personality.

title: Goofy
shortDescription: Mickey's tall, clumsy, and good-natured friend
biography: Goofy is a tall, anthropomorphic dog created by Walt Disney Productions. He is one of Mickey Mouse's best friends and is characterized by his clumsiness and dim-witted nature.

title: Pluto
biography: Pluto is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney. He is Mickey Mouse's pet dog and is one of the few Disney characters who is not anthropomorphized.

title: Walt Disney
shortDescription: American animator, film producer, and entrepreneur
biography: Walter Elias Disney was an American animator, film producer, and entrepreneur. A pioneer of the American animation industry, he introduced several developments in the production of cartoons.

title: Ub Iwerks
shortDescription: American animator and co-creator of Mickey Mouse
biography: Ubbe Ert Iwwerks, known as Ub Iwerks, was an American animator, cartoonist and special effects technician. He was known for his pioneering work and co-created Mickey Mouse with Walt Disney.

title: Steamboat Willie
shortDescription: 1928 animated short film featuring Mickey Mouse's debut
subject: Comedy, Music

title: Walt Disney Studios
shortDescription: Film and television production company headquarters

title: The Sensational Six
shortDescription: Core group of Disney cartoon characters

title: Daisy Duck
biography: Daisy Duck is Donald Duck's girlfriend. She is an anthropomorphic white duck who has purple eyeshadow, long eyelashes, and a signature purple outfit.
